Hi!

You would most likely be interested in configu=
ring a DecideRule, particularly MatchesFilePatternDecideRule (Heritrix 3, a=
nd there might be smth similar in other H versions). It has a preset called=
 "IMAGES" with a default pattern (".*(?i)(\\.(bmp|gif|jpe?g|png|svg|tiff?))=
$")

However, dont have it on your scope level, as you would not be able to=
 crawl any links if you filter all non-image pages. Try to configure it for=
 your writer-processor (e.g. ARCWriterProcessor) if you want to store image=
s only.
Try to search the group-messages for setting up DecideRules.

Cheer=
s,
Ikrom
